BootstrapBlazor.Shared.Pages.Alerts.Title: Alert
BootstrapBlazor.Shared.Pages.Alerts.SubTitle: Displays important alert messages.
BootstrapBlazor.Shared.Pages.Alerts.IntroText1: Alert components are non-overlay elements in the page that does not disappear automatically.

BootstrapBlazor.Shared.Pages.Alerts.IntroText2: Customize the close button as texts or other symbols.
